mapper.sql: authority_group_id, authority_group_name, list_order, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state
mapper.insert: insert into t_authority_group(authority_group_id, authority_group_name, list_order, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state) values (#{authorityGroupId}, #{authorityGroupName}, #{listOrder}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{state})
mapper.update: update t_authority_group set authority_group_name = #{authorityGroupName}, list_order = #{listOrder}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_by = #{createBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, state = #{state} where authority_group_id = #{authorityGroupId}
